body.raw:
Action rows act as a container for components. An Action row can have only 1 SelectMenu and 5 Buttons at the same time.You can send Maximum 5 action rows in a single message. Creating an ActionRow: ```ts import { ActionRow } from "https://deno.land/x/denocordts/mod.ts" const row = new ActionRow() ```

Methods on Action Row Class

> - addComponents → Takes in instances of Button or SelectMenu. > - removeAllComponents → Removes all components from ActionRow. Read Discord's Documentation on ActionRow [here](https://discord.com/developers/docs/interactions/message-components#action-rows).
